subject: Clarification/Modification of Policy Circulars
text: YRay 74 TTHPf qiferazrot (7em5 4Rdevt &r rTARf TAT4 , HRG FRGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) T7 Tnt 011-5 Q 6, 74z7-10, a1VFT, 78 fcrit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 3I /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Consultancy/2023 Policy Circular No.10.1.37/ 2023 dated 10th November , 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/11013/AEGIE/RFPDocu./2017 (Comp. No. 4312)} Sub: Clarification/Modification of Policy Circulars reg: Policy Circular No. 10.1.33/2022 dated 25.04.2022 regarding technical Capacity provisions in RFP for maximum works to be permitted to one consultant: ji. Policy Circular No. 11.41/2022 dated 12.08.2022 regarding amendment to RFP documents for engagement of Consultant: References   regarding interpretation of the Clauses/ Amendments issued vide   above referred Policy Circulars have been received and in this respect, the following clarifications are hereby issued: Clarification _for Policy Circular No_10.1.33/ 2022 dated 25.04.2022: (a) There is provision at Sr. no. 01, Column 02 for consideration of Average Annual Turnover of firm in last 3 financial years (from the consultancy work): The Average Annual Turnover for last three years and the No. of personnel on full time rolls are the parameters for deciding the no. of projects that can be awarded to the bidding firms. On that basis the Technical evaluation scores are decided: (b) The note below the table in the circular at para 3(v) specifies the following: For the purpose of calculation of maximum no. of projects, the works awarded on the date of opening of Financial Bid and in progress will be taken into consideration as utilized capacity. Projects of NHAI (awarded / in progress) shall be considered for maximum no. of projects in Sr. No. 3 & 4 of the table. The Consultant shall provide these details and they shall be solely responsible for accuracy of such details provided. In respect of above it is hereby clarified that "The works awarded on the date of opening of financial Bid and in progress will be taken into consideration for ascertaining the balance capacity. The revised turnover/manpower will not be considered and would remain the same as per Bid due date IL: Clarification of _Policy Circular_No. 11.412022 dated 12.08.2022: In respect of above referred Policy Circular it is clarified that "The bidder cannot revise their share among Lead/JV partner after submission of bids" Contd_2I - M U 7 91 NHAI Key key
